html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-07842017-06-20,  ,  ESDC,  INAC,  TC,  NRCAN,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA LABOUR CODE in order to (1) protect the health of employees in the federal jurisdiction and provide regulatory certainty by setting appropriate Occupational Exposure Limit for airborne asbestos fibre; (2) ensure consistency with most provincial and territorial regulatory regimes for airborne asbestos fibre; (3) protect the health of employees in the federal jurisdiction by regulating work activities such as handling, removal, repair or disturbance of asbestos-containing materials that could expose employees to friable asbestos; and (4) ensure that the Government of Canada is in compliance with the Asbestos Convention, 1986 (No. 162).
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0132 Publication Date: 2017-07-12
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the Canada Labour Code
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE CANADA LABOUR CODE in order to (1) protect the health of employees in the federal jurisdiction and provide regulatory certainty by setting appropriate Occupational Exposure Limit for airborne asbestos fibre; (2) ensure consistency with most provincial and territorial regulatory regimes for airborne asbestos fibre; (3) protect the health of employees in the federal jurisdiction by regulating work activities such as handling, removal, repair or disturbance of asbestos-containing materials that could expose employees to friable asbestos; and (4) ensure that the Government of Canada is in compliance with the Asbestos Convention, 1986 (No. 162).
